page.title: 14A FATHER'S DAY
page.content: My{father}gets up at 7.45 in the morning.He goes downstairs and gets the{breakfast}ready in the{kitchen.}He first clears the table and he lays it with knives,forks,plates,mugs and the butter.Then he calls my{mother}and me to come down and have breakfast.If we have cooked breakfast,he cooks it before he calls us.Then he has a bath and gets ready for work in{Abergavenny which is eleven miles away in his Renault 5 car. At his Modern and Antiquarian{book selling business,}he also provides{publishing and office {services}using an{electronic {typewriter and photocopier}After lunch he does some more office work before returning to Grosmont at 6 p.m. When he gets home,he relaxes by watching {T.V.,reading and gardening.Mum and Dad have their cooked evening meal at half past eight before going to bed at 10pm
